attributes.action: Stop plans to criminalise not paying back student loans
attributes.background: The UK government is making education less accessible to those from a working class background. To criminalise paying back these already outrageous tuition fees regardless of what you are earning after University in a certain amount of time is ridiculous.

rejection.details:
The Government has said that it has no plans to make it a criminal offence not to repay a student loan.

You can find out more in the response to this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/121888
